EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Virtual User Group Beta_2018.Confirmation_Approved_Apr18_CFSumm
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: April 17 PCF User Group Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Austin, TX.
We are very excited to be hosting this event. In the past, partners who have attended the event have been able to significantly fast track their integration with the Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform. We hope you'll find it as valuable as well.
What: Pivotal Partner Days: Software Integration Workshop When: February 22-23, 2017 Where: VMware, 3900 N Capital of Texas Hwy, Suite 500, Austin, TX 78746
Please review what you need to prepare and bring <[[https://pivotal.io/event/partner-days/austin/software-integration-workshop#beforeyouarrive]]> prior to the event.
Hotel Recommendations Hotel Granduca Austin <[[http://www.granducaaustin.com/]]> Renaissance Austin <[[http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/aussh-renaissance-austin-hotel/]]> Hyatt Place Austin <[[https://austinarboretum.place.hyatt.com/en/hotel/home.html]]>
Questions? Please contact Marina Joseph at mjoseph@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mjoseph@pivotal.io]]>.
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry ISV Engineering Team
